3: Lucia, are we finally safe now?
Yes, at least we can feed ourselves if we work every day... No more unnecessary risks...
But... Lucia, you've been coming back later and later...
After this, Luna, we'll have all the time in the world to be together.
Luna, your sister is amazing! She's doing so much work.
And she looks after everyone as well. It's like she's the class monitor back in my school.
Um... Can you... spare us some food...?
It's so cold lately, we're all too sick to even work... We don't have food either... We're not going to live...
I'm just borrowing it, okay? When I get my strength back, I can earn more food and return it to you, how's that?
We live in a group, so we should help each other to better everyone's lives!
